question: How can I become a Datwit team member?
answer: It's great you want to join us! We would really like to get to know you as a part of our family. Please get in touch with us real-time go ahead and contact us through any of the following ways: by our online form or e-mail [contact@datwit.com].

question: What are the main industries we serve?
answer: To provide the best services in the market we mainly focus our software development services on product development for several primary industries like: healthcare smart applications, renuevable energies smart monitoring and some agricultural smart applications.

question: What technologies do we use in software development?
answer: Our team includes only high-experienced professionals who have expertice in different software technologies such as:

question: What software development methodologies do we use?
answer: All our development and software testing processes are running while adhering to highly effective methodologies including Agile, Scrum, DevOps, and other methodologies to meet the highest KPIs in every project. We also document all the operations required to handle the development just to ensure the optimum project lifecycle. Our team have some experience using Team Data Science Process (TDSP), the Microsoft agile methodology to deliver intelligent apps.

question: Which is your payment method?
answer: In our company we use the following payment methods:

list.title: Credit cards. Those that use online security features like encryption and fraud monitoring to keep your accounts and personal information safe.
Direct debit and bank transfer to Datwit bank account.
Payment apps. Payment apps like PayPal, Google Pay and Apple Pay

question: Where are your HQ and employees located?
answer: Our headquarters and some of our employees are located in Spain and Serbia. So we are pretty open to remote work as long as there's a real commitment and job philosophy.
